Articles.Content: A while ago, I requested shuttle mod list. I have updated my ksp to 1.10 and re-installed the mods. First day, the Cormorant Aeronology mod Bugged and the laboratories and tunnels went all black on texture, Can anyone help?

The last update for Cormorant Aeronology was for KSP version 1.7.1. Since you are on 1.10, major to minor incompatibilities are to be expected. I'd recommend downgrading your KSP install. 

 

Furthermore, i believe this post should be moved to the Technical Support (PC, modded installs) topic.

The thing is I can't understand why today it's not working, but yesterday it did.

 

 

Edited August 31, 2020 by Kerbal Space Player
